üåå Eternity Storage - Full Disclaimer & Context

AI Character Simulation: This document is a fictional artifact from the LLOOOOMM universe, representing a manifest for a conceptual "eternity storage" system. All characters and events referenced are part of this creative, educational narrative.

Fictional Narrative: The "WTF Protocol" and the events described (like the "Belly Cat Scandal") are fictional plot points created for entertainment and to explore themes of information, chaos, and emergent order.

Educational Purpose: This simulation serves as a metaphorical exploration of concepts like data persistence, version control, and the archival of significant events within a complex, evolving system.
